alert.note: Alert for Logan; Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 10:39PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Logan, northeastern Christian, northeastern Sangamon and northwestern Macon Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1039 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Illiopolis, or 15 miles west of Decatur, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Niantic around 1045 PM CDT. Harristown and Warrensburg around 1050 PM CDT. Decatur around 1055 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Blue Mound. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 116 and 147. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central Illinois.
